", "answer": "If a beneficiary commits a default in the payment of contribution continuously for a period of one year, they shall cease to be a beneficiary of the fund. "}, {"question": "Can I resume my membership if I have defaulted on my contributions? ", "answer": "Yes, membership may be resumed with the permission of the Secretary of the board or any officer authorized by him.
